about_the_game:
Welcome to RC Car Simulator, the ultimate thrill ride where physics-defying stunts, explosive crashes, and pure unadulterated chaos await! Get behind the wheel of a mini RC car and dive headfirst into a vibrant, interactive world that reacts to every move you make. From high-flying flips to explosive collisions, there’s no limit to the mischief you can cause—except the occasional dent in your car!

Game Features:

Freedom of Action
Ever dreamed of controlling an RC car in an open world where the roads are just the beginning? Now you can! Speed, drift, jump, and pull off jaw-dropping stunts as you take on crazy ramps, dodge obstacles, and weave through unpredictable environments. The world is your playground, begging for your wildest tricks.

Dynamic Interaction
Crash through anything and everything in sight! Knock over vases, send streetlights flying, or create a chain reaction by toppling a row of dominoes—if it’s there, it’s fair game. No obstacle is too small, and every interaction has the potential to turn the world into utter chaos. Feel the satisfaction of destroying everything in your path, but be warned: everything reacts, so get ready for some unpredictable moments!

Scoring System: Perform and Dominate
The more outrageous the stunt, the higher your score! Earn points for ridiculous flips, mastering impossible drifts, and sending objects flying through the air. But be careful—take too many hits, and you’ll lose points fast. Keep your car in one piece to keep your high score intact. The balance of destruction and daring will push you to perfect your skills and take things to the next level.

Unlimited Fun & Experimentation
Imagine a world where everything—from the walls to the trees—is interactive. Crash into furniture, dive into pools, smash through glass windows, or even race up a staircase—there’s no wrong way to play here! Experiment with physics, test the environment’s limits, and see just how far you can push this chaotic, open-world sandbox.

Objective:

Here, there are no set rules—just pure, unfiltered fun. The game doesn’t force you into missions or time trials. The objective is simple: have a blast, perform insane stunts, and explore an environment bursting with possibilities. What will you do next? Maybe challenge yourself to the highest jump or see how many objects you can send flying in one go. The choice is yours, and the fun never stops.

Are you ready to take the wheel and leave your mark on this world of mayhem?
The world of RC Car Simulator is waiting, so gear up, rev that engine, and let’s ride, crash, and repeat to our heart’s content!

name: RC Car Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel i5 or AMD equivalent 4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel i5 or AMD equivalent 4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This isn’t just a racing game—it’s a chaotic playground where the world is your toy and the only goal is fun. Whether you’re an RC car fan or just looking to cause some mayhem, RC Car Simulator promises endless thrills and laugh-out-loud moments with every wild ride.
